Metadata.Title: The Philanderer
Metadata.Description: Word around town is Salvatore Bravuomo doesn't have as much integrity as he claims.According to his wife Catalina Winamicci,he's nothing more than cheating scum.Private Investigator Sal Falcone has snapped more than enough candids of the lawyer and his mistresses;not only his personal assistant,but a waitress AND regular customer found in the shop below his office.But,when Signora Winamicci learned of the gumar he keeps across town,she decided to have them all taken out.Break their hearts 47.
